articles.content: Amputated limbs, bodies sliced into two, rape, incest, cannibalism and faces with pus-filled boils. To put it mildly, Milind Raus The Village, based on a graphic novel of the same title and co-writte… [+5843 chars]

articles.title: Salman Khan on fans bursting crackers in theatres, pouring milk on posters - Hindustan Times
articles.description: When films of their favourite actors release, fans often offer milk on the stars' posters, burst crackers inside the theatres. Salman Khan discussed it. | Bollywood
articles.content: Salman Khan has reacted to fans bursting crackers inside the theatres after the release of a film to showcase their love for the actors. Speaking with news agency ANI, Salman said that he is "not at … [+2245 chars]
